resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Just link it?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerechtes Link es?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lien juste il ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligação justa ele?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamento giusto esso?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακριβώς σύνδεση αυτό;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Conexión justa él?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A hyperlink is a citation to someone else's intellectual property; therefore, linking should protect the source's integrity and make its identity clear.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Hypertext-Link ist ein Zitieren zu jemand anderes 
geistiges Eigentum; folglich sollte die Bindung die 
Vollständigkeit des Quell schützen und seinen Identität freien Raum
bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un hyperlien est une citation à quelqu'un d'autre 
propriété intellectuelle ; donc, joindre devrait protéger 
l'intégrité de la source et faire son espace libre d'identité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um hyperlink é uma citação a alguma outra pessoa 
propriedade intelectual; conseqüentemente, ligar deve proteger 
a integridade da fonte e fazer seu espaço livre da identidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un hyperlink è una citazione a qualcun'altro proprietà 
intellettuale; quindi, collegarsi dovrebbe proteggere 
l'integrità della sorgente e fare la relativa radura di identità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας σύνδεσμος υπερ-κειμένου είναι μια παραπομπή στην
πνευματική ιδιοκτησία κάποιου άλλου  επομένως, η σύνδεση 
πρέπει να προστατεύσει την ακεραιότητα της πηγής και να 
καταστήσει την ταυτότητά της σαφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un hyperlink es una citación algún otro característica 
intelectual; por lo tanto, la conexión debe proteger la 
integridad de la fuente y hacer su claro de la identidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108529</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/just-link-it</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
